rdev 0.1.0
  • Reference

    rdev

    Overview

    R Development Tools: My personalized collection of development packages, tools and utility functions.

    Feel free to use and/or fork this project!

    Installation

    You can install the development version from GitHub with:

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jabenninghoff/rdev")

    Or using renv:

    # install.packages("renv")
renv::install("jabenninghoff/rdev")

    Examples

    For my workflow, I typically check renv when I start:

    library(rdev)

check_renv()
#> renv::status()
#> * The project is already synchronized with the lockfile.
#> 
#> renv::clean()
#> * No stale lockfiles were found.
#> * No temporary directories were found in the project library.
#> * No non-system packages were discovered in the system library.
#> * No unused packages were found in the project library.
#> * The project is already clean.
#> 
#> renv::update()
#> * Querying repositories for available source packages ... Done!
#> * Checking for updated packages ... Done!
#> * All packages are up-to-date.

    I also have a ci() function to run all my continuous integration tests locally:

    ci()
